testcase.system-out: Given user is already on Home Page of Jobs..................................passed When user clicks on Sign in link............................................passed Then user enters Sign in details "cool.shailendra@yahoo.com" and "test@123".passed Then user clicks on Sign in button..........................................passed Then user clicks on About us link...........................................passed Then user is redirected to About us page....................................passed Then user clicks on Contact us link.........................................passed Then user is redirected to Contact us page..................................passed Then user clicks on Terms and conditions link...............................passed Then user is redirected to Terms and conditions page........................passed Then user clicks on Privacy policy link.....................................passed Then user is redirected to Privacy policy page..............................passed Then user clicks on Refund policy link......................................passed Then user is redirected to Refund policy page...............................passed Then user clicks on Help link...............................................passed Then user is redirected to Help page........................................passed
